text: Michelle Renee Clunie (born November 7, 1969) is an American actress, dancer and activist. She is best known for her roles as Melanie Marcus on Showtime's series Queer as Folk and as Ellen Beals on Make It or Break It. She is currently a star on MTVâ€™s Teen Wolf as Mrs. Finch. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American activists Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon
